queueUrl.description: The URL of the SQS Queue to which to attach the policy

redrivePolicy.description: The JSON redrive policy for the SQS queue. Accepts two key/val pairs: `deadLetterTargetArn` and `maxReceiveCount`. Learn more in the [Amazon SQS dead-letter queues documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSSimpleQueueService/latest/SQSDeveloperGuide/sqs-dead-letter-queues.html).
